Message:
There are other similarities
I’ve noticed between
this world and ours.

“Giant monsters wreak
calamity across the land.
Those who cross their paths
can only wish they are
in a dream.”

“They are disasters wrought by
the heavens and given shape.
The people call them
Mystical Beasts.”

Mystical Beasts—
the name of the creatures
feared back in our world.

Just like how Mystical Beasts
were feared in our world,
witches are feared in this one.

Hearing the word “witch”
probably brings to mind our Nadia,
who can use a variety of magic.

However, since this world
does not have magic like
the one found in ours,
witches are seen as abominations.

The girls in this world
are no different from us.
They just so happen to have
slightly extraordinary powers.

But the existence of
those powers has led to
the girls being blamed
for causing the calamity
called “Curses”...
